extendedInfo.description: ** Notice: Word Game 2 now available!Find as many words as possible from a pile of 7 random letters against the clock. Get a 'run' of words from the same set of letters to increase word score. ** This free version is ad. supported** Pro version has no ads., unlimited levels and more** News, FAQ and Hi Scores at:** http://funqai.com/and_wordrun.htmlFAQThese words arn't really words / A common word is not included.There are a great many words in use in the english language and I cannot hope to please everyone as to their definition of what is a word or not. The 2 dictionaries offered to use are official word lists used in tournament Scrabble. I think if anyone knows whether a word should be in or out of a game like this then it's these guys.INSTRUCTIONSSelect letters from the 'Rack' in the middle of the screen to form a word of 3 or more letters. If the word is listed in the dictionary and the word hasn't already been used on the level then the word is accepted. The word will be added to an area at the bottom of the screen for reference.If you can't find any more words from the rack then advance to the next level and receive new letters.The more words you find on any one level the higher the score you get for that word. This score is reset when advancing to a new level so it pays to find as many words as possible on any given level. The more letters a word contains the more time is added to your game for finding the word.There are a number of achievements to complete outside the normal rules of the game. These include having a particularly good run of words within a level, having consistently good runs over a number of levels, and finding a set number of words in each word length group.There is a small bonus added to you time when you start a new game based on the number of achievements you have completed. Will appeal to Scrabble players to crossword solvers. Uses professional tournament word lists (CSW12 / TWL06), US and UK spellings.

reviews.title: Trick?
reviews.comment: New way to make you buy?  Last five games an add pops up minutes after you begin playing, moving everything on the screen so as you are trying to touch a letter you end up hitting NEXT.   I lost 4 levels with 100+ words left because of this.  Move the ads or move the NEXT button. Too frustrating!
reviews.author: sherry cunfer

reviews.title: Greater than I expected, kudos!
reviews.comment: I was not expecting the game to be this awesome, the timer makes it challenging and fun,tone of dictionary words make even better,thanks for the developer for creating a gem of a game such as this one,please continue improving it with new updates,cheers!

reviews.title: Very Addicting
reviews.comment: This game is a very well contructed word puzzle type game in the Scrabble family.  Beat the clock and keep it ticking while finding as many words as you can per level.  Free version has about a dozen levels, which is plenty if you are just casual.  I will be buying the Pro version in a few minutes in show of support.   I started with Word Game and moved over to Word Run, I will probably buy both!
